duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute the product roadmaps through the New Product Introduction (NPI) process to ensure the products meet customer requirements and offer a competitive advantage.
Analyze customer feedback, competitor positioning, and industry trends to find product solutions.
Collaborate with NPI teams as the voice of the customer and make timely trade-off decisions based on customer requirements, cost, and timing impacts.
Work within a matrixed organization to launch new products, meet business metrics, and achieve customer satisfaction.
Coordinate findings within the Product Management team and align them with the business goals and priorities.
Oversee all stages of NPI and liaison with Global and Regional Marketing to deliver updates.
Provide product expertise on competitors’ solutions to meet customer needs.
Manage and prioritize the product backlog based on changing market conditions.
Participate in all Scrum meetings and product sprints.
Develop go-to-market strategy to ensure a competitive advantage in the areas of most value to the customer.
Develop product artifacts such as positioning, messaging, presentations, marketing collateral, and demonstrations for use in launch and training.

education_certification.credential: BS Degree in Technical or Science background
